name: SAMARA
description:
SAMARA is a first person, single player psychological survival horror game. The game unfolds as Player sets out to investigate the mysterious disappearance of his uncle, whom he hasn't heard from in over a year. He has no idea that this seemingly ordinary visit will send him into a terrifying experience beyond his wildest dreams.
Upon arriving at his uncle's secluded estate, the player is greeted by an unsettling silence that hangs heavy in the air. The once-familiar surroundings suddenly feel claustrophobic , as if there were invisible monsters lurking just beyond the shadows.
As he cautiously explores the dimly lit halls and forgotten corners of the house, a sense of foreboding intensifies with every step.
The nightmare begins with the finding of a lone doll that appears harmless at first glance. The glassy eyes of the doll seem to follow the player everywhere he goes, and something about it feels inherently wrong. Its presence also evokes an unexplainable feeling of dread.
As the night wears on and the tension reaches its peak, the player finds himself inexorably drawn back to the eerie doll, its presence a constant reminder of the malevolent forces at play. The doll's true nature is exposed in a climactic, terrifying showdown that unleashes a terror beyond description.
The player has to face the deepest recesses of his own mind in order to survive the night and discover the terrifying truth behind his uncle's disappearance, his nerves strained and his sanity on the verge of collapse. However, the doll's eerie stare stays, serving as a disturbing reminder of the horrors that lie just beneath the surface, even as daylight breaks and the nightmare fades.
Game feature:
  • The game is made in Unreal Engine
  • Players must navigate through a series of intricate puzzles scattered throughout the game
  • Immersive Realistic Graphics
  • Immersive Sound Effects
  • Dynamic Gameplay: With a combination of exploration, puzzle-solving, psychological suspense, and chasing sequence the game offers dynamic gameplay that keeps players engaged and challenged from start to finish.
  • Atmospheric Environment
